The Email Marketing Glossary

Your guide to all the acronyms and terms in the email world you always wanted. A project from Jason Rodriguez, The Better Email, and a bunch of email friends. Contribute on GitHub.

Blocklist

Also known as: Blacklist

The more inclusive term for a blacklist, or a list of senders that have run afoul of spam filters. Typically flagging senders by IP address, preventing messages from being delivered to recipients. Bad to be on.
